features_guide_body:
What can I do for you?

ğŸ“Š **Detailed Stats:** Check your real-time usage, remaining data, and expiration date.

ğŸ **Gifts & Points:** Get rewards by renewing your service, referring friends, and on your birthday.

ğŸ›’ **Shop:** Use your points to buy extra data or subscription days.

ğŸ”— **Smart Links:** Easily get and manage your subscription links.

ğŸ’¸ **Traffic Transfer:** Gift a portion of your data to your friends.

ğŸ©º **Connection Doctor:** Check server status if you face connection issues.
main_menu_tip: Tip: Earn points by referring friends and getting achievements, then spend them in the shop!

select_server_prompt: Please select which server's data you want to transfer from:
anniversary_gift_body:
Thank you for being with us for a whole year! As a token of our appreciation, a gift has been activated for you:

ğŸ `{gift_gb} GB` data and `{gift_days}` days of credit

This gift has been automatically added to your account. We hope you continue to stay with us.
plan_guide_combined: âœ¨ These plans are designed for more flexibility, giving you data from multiple servers.
plan_guide_dedicated: ğŸ’¡ These plans are suitable for users who know which country provides better stability for their internet.
loyalty_message_line1: ğŸ’ You have renewed your service {payment_count} times.
loyalty_message_line2: Only {renewals_left} more renewals until your next gift ({gb_reward} GB data + {days_reward} days credit)!
achievements_intro:
In this section, you can see the badges you earn through your activity.

With each badge, you get *points* that you can use in the 'Achievements Shop' to buy extra data and subscription days.

Some badges are hidden and will be revealed once you earn them. Keep going and discover them all!
referral_intro: By referring your friends to the bot, after their first purchase, both of you will receive a gift of {gb} GB of data and {days} days of credit.
referral_pending_list_title: â³ List of Users Pending Purchase:

If you have already made the payment, please send the receipt to support. Otherwise, to avoid service interruption, please proceed with the payment.

Thank you for your cooperation.
